10 void callback(const calib::MatchesConstPtr& matches)
11 {
12  te.reset();
13 
14  if (te.use_planes)
15  {
16  vector<Eigen::Vector4f> planes1;
17  vector<Eigen::Vector4f> planes2;
18  for (int i = 0; i < matches->planes1.size(); i++)
19  {
20  planes1.push_back(Eigen::Vector4f(matches->planes1[i].coef[0], matches->planes1[i].coef[1], matches->planes1[i].coef[2], matches->planes1[i].coef[3]));
21  planes2.push_back(Eigen::Vector4f(matches->planes2[i].coef[0], matches->planes2[i].coef[1], matches->planes2[i].coef[2], matches->planes2[i].coef[3]));
22  }
23  te.addPlanes(planes1, true, te.weight);
24  te.addPlanes(planes2, false, te.weight);
25  }
26 
27  if (te.use_points)
28  {
29  vector<Eigen::Vector3f> points1;
30  vector<Eigen::Vector3f> points2;
31 
32  pcPtr keypoints1(new pc_t);
33  convert(matches->points1, keypoints1);
34  pcPtr keypoints2(new pc_t);
35  convert(matches->points2, keypoints2);
36 
37  if (keypoints1->points.size() < 2)
38  {
39  return;
40  }
41 
42  for (int i = 0; i < keypoints1->points.size(); i++)
43  {
44  points1.push_back(Eigen::Vector3f(keypoints1->points[i].x, keypoints1->points[i].y, keypoints1->points[i].z));
45  points2.push_back(Eigen::Vector3f(keypoints2->points[i].x, keypoints2->points[i].y, keypoints2->points[i].z));
46  }
47  // points1.push_back(Eigen::Vector3f(0,0,0));
48  // points2.push_back(Eigen::Vector3f(0,0,0));
49  te.addPoints(points1, true);
50  te.addPoints(points2, false);
51  }
52 
53  Eigen::Affine3d T(te.getTransform(te.compute_translation, te.compute_rotation));
54  tf::Transform transform;
55  if (!te.inverse)
56  {
57  tf::transformEigenToTF(T.inverse(), transform);
58  }
59  else
60  {
61  tf::transformEigenToTF(T, transform);
62  }
63  static tf::TransformBroadcaster br;
64  br.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(transform, ros::Time::now(), te.frame, name));
65 
66  calib::TF msg;
67  double rx, ry, rz;
68  msg.tx = transform.getOrigin().getX();
69  msg.ty = transform.getOrigin().getY();
70  msg.tz = transform.getOrigin().getZ();
71  msg.it_transl = 0;
72  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(transform.getRotation());
73  mat.getEulerYPR(rx, ry, rz);
74  msg.rx = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rx;
75  msg.ry = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * ry;
76  msg.rz = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rz;
77  msg.it_rot = 0;
78  pub.publish(msg);
79 }
80 
81 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
82 {
84 // init
85  string name1 = argv[1];
86  string name2 = argv[2];

89  string node_name = (string) "transform_estimation_" + name;
90  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name);
91  ros::NodeHandle nh;
92  ros::NodeHandle node_te("/calib/" + name + "/transform_estimation");
93 
94  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe(topic, 1, &callback);
95  pub = nh.advertise<calib::TF>("/calib/tf/" + name, 1);
96
